External sources/libraries/APIs - redistributed 'AS IS' (unless documented otherwise)

Included in and used by ZenMagick:

Cache_Lite
Fast and Safe little cache system.
Creole
Database abstractation layer.
NOTE: This has been repackaged into a single compressed file.
PHPass
Portable PHP password hashing framework.
NOTE: Slightly modified to allow to change the hash identifier.
spyc
A Simple PHP YAML Class.
